channel.title: Ajax on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Ajax on My New Hugo Site

item.title: KnockoutJS demo using Google Books API
item.description: Knockout.js Introduction A quick and dirty demo to show off a very simple example of what you can do with some knockoutjs code and an AJAX call. I use the google books API to provide a simple search form. Show me the Code JSFiddle: Check out the jsfiddle I also use the underscore library to work with the observableArray but that is not really a requirement. I just like it.
